title: Probability of Getting a Job
question_text:
Suppose Johnny applied for a job at companies A and B.
Through extensive research, Johnny determined he has a $60\%$ chance of getting a job offer from company A, a $50\%$ chance of getting a job offer from company B, and a $30\%$ chance of getting a job offer from both companies A and B.
What is the probability of Johnny not getting a job offer from either company?
